public class ControlBus
extends Bus
This class represents a Control Bus

Version:
0.1
Author:
Beno Kurmann, Michel Marti

READ
Broadcast this value if you want to read from a component
WRITE
Broadcast this value if you want to write into a component

ControlBus()
Constructs a new 2 bit wide ControlBus
ControlBus(Component)
Constructs a new 2 bit wide ControlBus
ControlBus(int)
Constructs a new ControlBus

READ 
 public static final int READ
Broadcast this value if you want to read from a component

WRITE 
 public static final int WRITE
Broadcast this value if you want to write into a component

ControlBus

Constructs a new 2 bit wide ControlBus

ControlBus

Constructs a new ControlBus

ControlBus 
 public ControlBus(Component cmp) throws IllegalAccessException
Constructs a new 2 bit wide ControlBus

Parameters:
